articles.title: US storm: Dozens dead as big freeze grips North America - BBC
articles.description: At least 38 deaths are now linked to a fearsome winter storm pummelling much of the US and Canada.
articles.content:
Media caption, A winter storm causes widespread disruption across North America
At least 38 deaths have now been linked to a severe Arctic freeze that continues to pummel the US and Canada.

articles.title: 5 arrested in deadly shooting at Minnesota's Mall of America - CP24
articles.description: Five people were arrested in the fatal shooting of a 19-year-old man at the Mall of America that sent the sprawling commercial center into lockdown on one of the final days of the holiday shopping season, police said Saturday.
